title: Browse Mode: Display all 99 Names compactly
description: Verify that upon loading Browse Mode, the list of all 99 Names of Allah is displayed as compact bilingual cards with correct initial states.

steps.description: Open the application and navigate to Browse Mode.
Check that exactly 99 name cards are displayed.
Verify each card shows the Arabic name and Swedish translation in a compact view.
Ensure grammar badges are visible on the cards where applicable.

title: Browse Mode: Card expand and details display
description: Verify user can expand any name card to view additional details including linguistic roots and Quranic references.

steps.description: In Browse Mode, tap on a compact name card.
Ensure the card expands smoothly displaying linguistic roots, Quranic references, and detailed explanations.
Check that Arabic calligraphy and Swedish text use premium typography.

title: Browse Mode: Filter by category
description: Verify filtering names by categories (Jalal, Jamal, Kamal) correctly updates displayed cards.

steps.description: Navigate to Browse Mode.
Select 'Jalal' category filter.
Confirm the list only shows names categorized under 'Jalal'.
Select 'Jamal' category filter.
Confirm the list only shows names categorized under 'Jamal'.
Select 'Kamal' category filter.
Confirm the list only shows names categorized under 'Kamal'.

title: Browse Mode: Filter by status (Favorites, Memorized)
description: Verify filtering by user status flags correctly filters names marked as Favorite or Memorized.

steps.description: Mark several names as Favorite and several others as Memorized in Browse Mode.
Apply 'Favorites' filter.
Verify only names marked as Favorite are displayed.
Apply 'Memorized' filter.
Verify only names marked as Memorized are displayed.

title: Browse Mode: Real-time search updates list
description: Verify that typing in the search bar updates the displayed cards in real time matching the query.

steps.description: Navigate to Browse Mode.
Type a partial Arabic name or Swedish translation into search input.
Verify the card list updates immediately showing only matching names.
Clear search input.
Confirm all 99 names are shown again.

title: Browse Mode: Audio playback correctness
description: Verify the audio pronunciation plays clearly and correctly matches the selected name upon audio control interaction.

steps.description: In Browse Mode, expand a name card.
Click the audio playback button on the name card.
Check that audio plays immediately and the pronunciation matches the selected name.
Click audio playback on a different name.
Confirm audio switches smoothly to new pronunciation without lag or mix.

title: Flashcard Mode: Deck management and difficult name prioritization
description: Verify that Flashcard Mode prioritizes difficult names based on user input and supports deck management functionality.

steps.description: Switch to Flashcard Mode.
Mark several names as difficult during flashcard reviews.
Restart the flashcard session.
Verify that flashcards prioritize showing difficult marked names earlier in the deck.
Use deck management controls to filter and reorder flashcards.
Confirm deck updates accordingly and reflects selections immediately.

title: Flashcard Mode: Card flip interaction
description: Verify that flashcards flip smoothly between front and back with correct content displayed.

steps.description: In Flashcard Mode, display a flashcard.
Trigger flip action (tap or click).
Verify the card flips with smooth animation showing the back side with the correct detailed information.
Flip the card back to the front.
Confirm the original front content is restored with smooth animation.

title: Quiz Mode: Multiple choice question generation and answering
description: Verify Quiz Mode generates valid multiple-choice questions and provides immediate feedback upon answer selection.

steps.description: Enter Quiz Mode and select multiple-choice quiz type.
Verify a question is displayed with the prompt and multiple answer options.
Select a correct answer.
Check that feedback indicates a correct choice and score is updated.
Select an incorrect answer on a new question.
Verify feedback shows the answer was incorrect and the correct answer is highlighted.

title: Quiz Mode: Fill-in-the-blank question answering and scoring
description: Verify fill-in-the-blank quiz questions accept input, validate answers, provide feedback and update user progress.

steps.description: Start Quiz Mode and select fill-in-the-blank question type.
Confirm a question with blank input is displayed.
Enter a correct name answer in the input field.
Verify immediate positive feedback and score increment.
Enter an incorrect answer.
Confirm feedback showing the answer is wrong with correct solution shown.

title: Quiz Mode: Session progress tracking and score persistence
description: Verify Quiz Mode correctly tracks number of questions answered, score, and saves progress between sessions.

steps.description: Take a quiz session answering multiple questions.
Verify the progress bar updates reflecting number of questions answered.
Confirm the score updates correctly on each answer.
Close the app and reopen it.
Check that the quiz progress and score are persisted and restored correctly from LocalStorage.

title: LocalStorage: Persist favorites, memorized status, and quiz scores
description: Verify that user markings for favorites and memorized names and quiz scores are saved to LocalStorage and restored on app reload.

steps.description: Mark some names as Favorites and Memorized.
Complete some quiz questions to generate a score.
Close and reopen the app.
Verify that Favorites and Memorized flags persist on the same names.
Confirm quiz scores and progress are restored accurately.

title: UI: Application adheres to premium dark mode theme and typography
description: Verify that the application UI uses dark mode theme with golden accents, elegant Arabic calligraphy fonts, and clean Swedish text across all modes.

steps.description: Load the app and ensure dark mode is active.
Check that background, text colors, and accents follow premium golden-dark style guidelines.
Verify Arabic text uses the specified elegant calligraphy fonts.
Confirm Swedish text is rendered in clean readable typography.
Navigate through Browse, Flashcard, and Quiz Modes.
Ensure theme and typography consistency is maintained throughout.

title: UI: Responsive design on different device sizes
description: Verify that the application UI adjusts properly and remains usable on different screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browser.
Check that all interface elements are visible and spaced properly.
Resize the browser window to tablet size.
Verify layout adapts, ensuring no overflow or clipped content.
Open the app on a mobile device emulator or device.
Confirm the UI rearranges to a mobile-friendly format with accessible controls and readable text.

title: Interactive cards feedback and performance
description: Verify interactive cards respond immediately and visually appealing when user interacts with controls such as favorite toggle, memorized marking, audio playback, and expansion.

steps.description: In Browse Mode, interact with the favorite toggle on a card.
Check visual feedback such as icon color change occurs instantly.
Mark a card as Memorized.
Ensure UI reflects this change with appropriate styling without lag.
Expand and collapse a card repeatedly.
Verify smooth animations occur with no flickering or delays.

title: Error handling: Invalid filter states
description: Verify application handles invalid or empty filter states gracefully without crashing or displaying incorrect data.

steps.description: Manually set filters to a combination that results in no matching names.
Verify the UI shows a friendly message indicating no results rather than empty or broken layout.
Clear filters.
Check all names reappear correctly.

title: Error handling: Audio playback failure
description: Verify the application handles cases where audio playback fails by showing proper error feedback and allowing retry.

steps.description: Simulate an audio loading or playback failure (e.g., disconnect network or corrupt audio file).
Attempt to play audio for a name.
Verify that a user-visible error message is displayed.
Retry audio playback.
Check that the retry either succeeds or re-displays the error gracefully without crashing the app.

title: Localization: Verify Swedish and Arabic text rendering and RTL/LTR handling
description: Verify that the application correctly renders Swedish and Arabic text with proper directionality and language settings.

steps.description: Load the app with Swedish language setting.
Confirm that Swedish text is shown correctly in LTR direction.
Switch to Arabic language setting.
Verify Arabic text is rendered properly with RTL direction and UI adjusts where needed.
Check that bilingual cards handle mixed-language content gracefully.

title: Settings: Theme and audio preference persistence
description: Verify user changes to theme (dark mode) and audio playback preferences in the Settings UI are saved and persist across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings interface.
Change theme preferences e.g., enable or disable dark mode.
Adjust audio settings such as volume or playback speed.
Close and reopen the app.
Verify changed theme and audio preferences are correctly restored.
